name: chilling with hot chocolate
description:
Enjoy a nice, wintery moment of respite from this busy world of constant hustle-and-bustle. Watch snow falling outside, consume hot chocolate from your trusty mug, and achieve Chill (for, like, half a minute) from the coziness of your awesome and unusually well-lit home.

(thinking about it, the hot chocolate could also just be coffee if you want)
